docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
v : Vector
    The input vector to replace subset from
docstring.short_description: The REPLACE_SUBSET node returns a new Vector with subset of elements replaced.

parameters.name: indices
parameters.description: specified indices to replace values at from the input vector

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: subset of values to replace the specified indices

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: number of elements to replace from the input vector, default is 1 (this only applies when one index is specified for indices parameter)

returns.description: The new vector with subset of elements replaced from the input vector
